name: SpliceSoftware
0:
”Alexa, ask Splice Software for the latest news”
”Text that to me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: splice software
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Stay up to date on the latest news from Splice Software. With this skill you can...

* Hear the latest Splice Software Facebook posts
* Have any post texted to your phone

A great way to keep informed using just your voice.
